name: mylar3
description: Mylar3 is an automated comic book downloader and manager. It can monitor series, download issues, and organize comic archives with integration for download clients and metadata tools.

features.title: Download Automation
features.description: Integrate with download clients like SABnzbd and NZBGet for automated comic book downloading

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Fetch and organize comic metadata including covers, descriptions, and publication information

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatically rename and organize comic files using customizable naming conventions and folder structures

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage your comic collection through a responsive web-based interface accessible from any device

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Connect with multiple comic databases and indexers to find and download missing issues
